articles.title: 'We can settle score against India in Asia Cup final': Ex-Pakistan star - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Moin Khan kept his fingers crossed not only for a game but also for a better show from Pakistan against Sri Lanka to book a re-match with India in the final. | Cricket
articles.content: Former Pakistan keeper-batter Moin Khan urged Pakistan to move on quickly from the 228-run thrashing and be ready to settle scores with India, provided they make the final. Pakistan need to beat Sri … [+2801 chars]

articles.description: Jasprit Bumrah has bowled just 12 overs so far, Mohammed Siraj and Hardik Pandya have chipped in with 19.2 and 18, respectively.
articles.content: Having already sealed a place in the final, India will be tempted to test their fringe players when they face an already knocked out Bangladesh in a Super Four match of the Asia Cup here on Friday. T… [+3847 chars]
